com.novicehacks.autobot.config

Class ResourceConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.novicehacks.autobot.config.ResourceConfig

  • public final class ResourceConfig
extends Object

    Will hold the configuration object, and other object for using across the application where ever needed. This is a singleton instance and also an immutable object. Hence once the data is loaded, there will be no modifications for this object.

    Below are some of the configurations that this Config bean hold

    • Configuration (System Configuration)
    • Collection of Servers
    • Collection of Commands
    • Collection of Executables
    • Collection of Monitors

    Author:
    Sharath Chand Bhaskara for NoviceHacks

    • Method Detail

      • loadConfig

        protected void loadConfig(Set<Server> serverSet,
              Set<Command> command,
              Set<Executable> executables,
              Set<Monitor> monitors)
        Loads the configurations for this application. Tyring to invoke this method more than once will throw IllegalStateException.

        Throwing the exception is being reviewed and might be modified in the next releases

        Parameters:
        serverSet - Set of servers where the commands to be executed
        command - Set of command to execute on the servers
        executables - Set of commands that has to be executed in a scheduled interval
        monitors - Set of commands to be monitored and reported if crossing the threshold

      • getInstance

        public static ResourceConfig getInstance()
        Returns the singleton instance of the AutobotConfig object.
        Returns:
        Configuration Object will the system and resource configurations.
